requirement_tested: Implement a whistleblower secrets/awareness website with anonymous reporting functionality
user_persona: A concerned citizen who has uncovered sensitive corporate misconduct.
user_goal: To navigate to the anonymous reporting form to submit critical evidence.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Maya arrives at the whistleblower website, seeking a way to report her findings. She notices the clean azure background and midnight blue UI elements.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the homepage layout.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Homepage renders with azure background and midnight blue navigation bar and components.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Anonymous Report
narrative_steps.description: Maya sees the prominent 'Submit Report Anonymously' button in the header and decides to click it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Submit Report Anonymously' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: User is redirected to the anonymous reporting form page.

requirement_tested: Provide a submission form for users to anonymously report insights and upload evidence
user_persona: An insider with knowledge of illegal activities at their company.
user_goal: To securely submit a detailed report along with supporting evidence anonymously.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Out Report Details
narrative_steps.description: On the report form page, Alex begins entering a title and description into the respective fields.
narrative_steps.action: Enter text into Title and Description fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Fields accept input normally without error.

narrative_steps.title: Uploading Evidence File
narrative_steps.description: Alex chooses a PDF file under 10MB to attach as evidence by clicking the file input.
narrative_steps.action: Select a valid PDF file (<10MB) via the file upload input.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: File selection completes successfully and passes client-side validation.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting the Report
narrative_steps.description: After filling out the form and attaching the file, Alex clicks the 'Submit Report' button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form data is sent to /api/reports/submit and confirmation message appears.

requirement_tested: Include a discussion forum allowing users to post, reply, and engage in threaded conversations
user_persona: A community member interested in discussing societal issues.
user_goal: To participate in ongoing discussions by replying to an existing thread.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Forum Section
narrative_steps.description: Jordan clicks on the 'Forum' link in the navigation menu to explore current topics.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Forum' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the forum page showing list of threads.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Thread and Replying
narrative_steps.description: Jordan finds an interesting thread and clicks on it to read more. Then, they decide to contribute by clicking the Reply button.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a thread card, then click the 'Reply' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Thread expands and a reply form appears below the selected post.

requirement_tested: Integrate a search functionality enabling keyword and topic-based content discovery
user_persona: A researcher looking for specific content across the platform.
user_goal: To find articles, reports, and forum posts related to environmental violations.

narrative_steps.title: Using Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: Taylor types 'environmental violations' into the search bar located in the header.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'environmental violations' into the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Live suggestions appear after typing three characters.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Search Query
narrative_steps.description: Taylor presses Enter to initiate the search across all content sections.
narrative_steps.action: Press Enter key in the search input.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to search results page displaying categorized matches from reports, forums, and articles.

requirement_tested: Develop a news and blog section displaying latest articles and updates
user_persona: A regular visitor wanting to stay updated with recent developments.
user_goal: To read the latest article published on the platform.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing News & Blog Section
narrative_steps.description: Riley navigates to the News & Blog section from the main navigation.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'News & Blog' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the News & Blog page displaying article cards.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Full Article
narrative_steps.description: Riley clicks on the first article card to read the complete story.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the first article card or its 'Read More' link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the full article page with complete content displayed.

requirement_tested: Design the website with an azure background and midnight blue UI components
user_persona: A new user visiting the site for the first time.
user_goal: To experience a consistent visual theme throughout the website.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Site Colors
narrative_steps.description: Casey lands on the homepage and looks around to get familiar with the interface design.
narrative_steps.action: View different parts of the homepage including header, buttons, and cards.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All backgrounds are azure and all UI components (buttons, headers, etc.) are styled in midnight blue.

requirement_tested: Create a frontend that dynamically fetches all content through backend APIs
user_persona: A developer checking that frontend properly integrates with backend services.
user_goal: To verify that dynamic content loads correctly when accessing the homepage.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Dev opens the homepage expecting to see dynamic content loaded from backend APIs.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage URL in browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend makes concurrent API calls and renders dynamic sections like latest reports, forum threads, and articles.

requirement_tested: Build a backend system connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A DevOps engineer deploying the backend service.
user_goal: To confirm that the backend connects to the PostgreSQL database using correct environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Engineer sets the required environment variables and starts the backend server.
narrative_steps.action: Set DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp and start backend.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server initializes and establishes successful connection to PostgreSQL database using provided credentials.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json with 'npm run install:all' script to install frontend and backend dependencies
user_persona: A developer setting up the project locally for the first time.
user_goal: To install all necessary dependencies for both frontend and backend simultaneously.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Developer runs the setup command to install all required packages for the entire project.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` in terminal from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependencies are installed concurrently without errors.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json with 'npm run dev' script to start both frontend and backend concurrently
user_persona: A developer ready to begin local development work.
user_goal: To launch both frontend and backend development servers at once.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Developer executes the dev command to bring up both frontend and backend environments.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend development servers start concurrently and are accessible.

requirement_tested: Ensure all data including reports, forum posts, and articles are stored persistently in the database
user_persona: A QA tester validating data persistence after submission.
user_goal: To ensure submitted data remains saved even after refreshing the page.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting New Data
narrative_steps.description: Tester submits a new report, forum post, and article through the UI.
narrative_steps.action: Submit one report, one forum post, and one article via respective forms.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each submission returns success response indicating data was accepted.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Persistence After Refresh
narrative_steps.description: Tester refreshes the relevant pages to confirm data still exists.
narrative_steps.action: Refresh the report detail, forum thread, and article pages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Previously submitted data persists and displays correctly on refreshed pages.

requirement_tested: Implement user authentication system to support anonymous submissions while maintaining security
user_persona: An anonymous reporter submitting sensitive information.
user_goal: To submit a report without revealing identity while ensuring session-level tracking.

narrative_steps.title: Beginning Anonymous Submission Flow
narrative_steps.description: Reporter starts the anonymous reporting process which should trigger generation of a temporary token.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to anonymous report form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend automatically calls /api/auth/generate-anonymous-token and receives a temporary session token.

narrative_steps.title: Completing Secure Submission
narrative_steps.description: Reporter fills and submits the form, relying on the generated token for secure handling.
narrative_steps.action: Fill and submit the anonymous report form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Report is submitted securely using the token, with no identifiable user info recorded.

requirement_tested: Enable file upload capability for evidence submission with appropriate validation and storage
user_persona: A whistleblower preparing to upload proof of wrongdoing.
user_goal: To upload a compliant document as part of an anonymous report.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Valid File
narrative_steps.description: Whistleblower selects a small-sized PDF file meeting format and size requirements.
narrative_steps.action: Choose a valid PDF file <10MB from local machine.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Client-side validation confirms the file meets criteria before proceeding.

narrative_steps.title: Uploading Evidence
narrative_steps.description: Whistleblower triggers the upload which sends the file to the backend for processing.
narrative_steps.action: Trigger file upload during report submission.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: File uploads successfully to /uploads/evidence/ with unique ID assigned and linked to report.

requirement_tested: Provide moderation tools for administrators to manage reports, forum content, and published articles
user_persona: An administrator responsible for overseeing platform content.
user_goal: To review and moderate newly submitted content using administrative controls.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Admin Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Admin logs in and accesses the moderation dashboard to oversee pending items.
narrative_steps.action: Log in as admin and navigate to /admin/reports.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard loads showing grid/list of pending reports requiring moderation.

narrative_steps.title: Moderating Content
narrative_steps.description: Admin reviews a report and decides to approve it for public viewing.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Approve' button next to a pending report.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Report status changes to 'reviewed/published' in database and disappears from pending queue.

requirement_tested: Optimize search functionality to index and retrieve content across reports, forums, and blog posts
user_persona: A frequent user searching for previously discussed topics.
user_goal: To quickly locate relevant historical content using optimized search.

narrative_steps.title: Performing Keyword Search
narrative_steps.description: User enters a common keyword known to exist in various content types.
narrative_steps.action: Enter keyword in search bar and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System performs full-text search using PostgreSQL tsvector/tsquery and returns ranked results.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Results Across Sections
narrative_steps.description: User examines results spanning reports, forums, and articles to find what they need.
narrative_steps.action: Browse returned results categorized by content type.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Results display efficiently across multiple domains with accurate relevance ranking.
